Attack_Pattern.Name: Use of Known Kerberos Credentials
Attack_Pattern.Description: An adversary obtains (i.e. steals or purchases) legitimate Kerberos credentials (e.g. Kerberos service account userID/password or Kerberos Tickets) with the goal of achieving authenticated access to additional systems, applications, or services within the domain.

Indicators.Indicator: Authentication attempts use expired or invalid credentials.
Data is being transferred and/or removed from systems/applications within the network.
Suspicious or Malicious software is downloaded/installed on systems within the domain.

Mitigations.Mitigation: Create a strong password policy and ensure that your system enforces this policy for Kerberos service accounts.
Ensure Kerberos service accounts are not reusing username/password combinations for multiple systems, applications, or services.
